text: The brightest minds of this bunker have concluded that, in order to survive, experimentation on the parasites must begin.
By themselves, these creatures are weak.
But once they infect another host, the parasites become a threat to life on Earth as we know it.
If we ever hope to leave this bunker and eradicate them, we must develop either a cure for the infected...
Or a weapon to destroy them all.
This is the purpose behind this project.
